Trade/Device Name(s): Contour® next GEN Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the Contour® next GEN Blood Glucose Monitoring System with Bluetooth connectivity and quantitative glucose measurement in capillary blood.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the fingertip, for self-testing by people with diabetes at home as an aid in monitoring the effectiveness of a diabetes control program; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
